segments.text: Good afternoon , Lexington Software . Angelina Dawson , how can I help ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , this is Quinn from IBA .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah , hello Quinn . Oh dear , you are calling to tell me there is a problem , aren't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm ... well , it was my first attempt ! Is it a very big mistake , or can we just alter it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Unfortunately it's rather a big mistake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you recommend we do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would recommend we scrap this one and you bring in another set as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I trust your judgement . Thank you , Quinn . I'll be back tomorrow with a new set . Bye for now .
segments.speaker: S1
